Text: Awesome upload... Fixed my ctd so I is one happy bunny!!!!

Fixed the cursor problems, but it doesnt fix the in-game bug at Act III, the "The fall of Eboracum" quest and the quest where you are suposed to get the second Shard of the Grail.. pretty much everywhere ive turned my eyes ive seen people complaining about that bug, lots of people get stuck.. There is also several other bugs, the buff ring around your main hero doesnt apply the buffs, some locationbuffs as for Heavy infantry does not apply either.. This game is far from finished, sad to realise it before even trying to play through it, they can't have, since its impossible..
Is SKIDROW planning on posting the 1.03 update?
The patch notes says it took care of the quest problems...but cant seem to find it anywhere. Saw a post with a person actually praising paradox for sending 3 patches two weeks after release. ':D

PLEASE SKIDROW! 
Now we are at  v1.1.04 for the game to be working reasonably well...please help us!

GL, hope that helps.
